Package main.java.neat.visualizer

Class GenomeVisualizer

java.lang.Object
main.java.neat.visualizer.GenomeVisualizer
public class GenomeVisualizer
extends java.lang.Object
Renders neural network architectures as visual images. Handles visualization of genomes including nodes, connections, colors, and shapes based on network properties. Supports customizable appearance through color schemes and node shapes.

Key features:

  • Different colors for input/hidden/output nodes
  • Visual distinction between positive/negative/recurrent connections
  • Configurable node shapes and sizes
  • Transparency support through ARGB images
Author:
Taher Joudeh

    • visualizeGenome

      public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage visualizeGenome​(GenomeVisualizer visualizer, java.lang.String backgroundColor, boolean drawDisabled, boolean activateAll, Genome genome, double maxWeightValue, int width, int height)
      Generates visualization image of a genome's neural network.
      Parameters:
      visualizer - Configured visualizer instance.
      backgroundColor - Background color in hex format (#RRGGBB) or null for transparent.
      drawDisabled - Whether to render disabled connections.
      activateAll - Force all nodes to appear activated.
      genome - Genome to visualize.
      maxWeightValue - Maximum weight value for connection thickness scaling.
      width - Image width in pixels.
      height - Image height in pixels.
      Returns:
      BufferedImage containing network visualization.
